rule.demo: Detect the package type and grab it, then place it at the target location.
Grab the package and mail it to the target location at the same time.
Check the safety of the environment, grab the package, and then move it to the target location.
interrupt the assembly if the environment is unsafe, otherwise assemble the parts and check the quality.
task execution: assemble the required parts and package them securely for shipping
retrieve the parts that meet the positioning requirements and check the quality after assembly
retrieve the necessary parts and position them correctly before assembly

rule.pattern: grab the necessary parts, position them correctly, and then assemble the parts
rule.demo: grab the necessary parts, position them correctly, and then assemble the parts
check the component status, and then assemble the parts
check the component status, and then check the assembly quality
request human assistance and grab the parts at the same time if necessary

rule.pattern: (check .*? )are available, then start the assembly process
rule.demo: check that all parts needed for assembly are available, then start the assembly process
